document_data.name: Evren Feray
document_data.mainbody:
'''Evren Feray''' ({{Pronounce|EHV|rehn|furr|AY|refs={{Cite adventurers league/Breaking Umberlee's Resolve|16}}}}) was a [[diviner]] as well as the chief navigator and sailing master of a [[caravel]] that operated out of [[Ayakar]] in [[Turmish]], and throughout the [[Sea of Fallen Stars]].{{Cite adventurers league/Breaking Umberlee's Resolve|8-9}}

{{Quote|I see a deer with too many antlers. I see a talon that never arcs toward prey...Hawks circle overhead. The woman you seek is in darkness, ensnared by tentacles.|Evren's vision regarding [[Zehira Deryan]].}}
document_data.Personality: She was a rather warm individual that enjoyed meeting new people and availing them of her services.
document_data.Abilities: While at sea, Evren used [[divination]] magic to better navigate the open seas and avoid perils during the ships voyages. Interestingly enough, her powers originated from her rigorous studies of nautical navigation and seafaring.
document_data.Possessions: Evren kept a number of [[map]]s that detailed notable locations across the Sea of Fallen Stars.
document_data.Relationships: She was a trusted advisor to Captain [[Lazlo Sharktooth]].
document_data.History:
Some time during or after the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, Captain Lazlo and his crew took on a job to uncover the whereabouts of [[Zehira Deryan]]. During their journey, Evren performed a divination ritual in an attempt to discern Zehira's exact location.

Later on, she joined the landing party that ventured onto [[Hawk's Isle]] in search of the missing noblewoman. While the party was resting, Evren and her crewmate [[Samara Elisiar]] were abducted by  the [[morkoth]] [[Axar Xyrl]],{{Cite adventurers league/Breaking Umberlee's Resolve|11}} and taken back to its lair.{{Cite adventurers league/Breaking Umberlee's Resolve|14}}
